content: create your adorable highland cow amigurumi with this fun and detailed crochet pattern perfect for beginner and experienced crocheters this pattern guides you through each step to bring this fluffy long-haired cow to life materials needed chernille yarn in brown beige and cream for the body muzzle and horns 4 5 mm crochet hook safety eyes or embroidery thread for a child-friendly version fiberfill stuffing for a soft and cuddly finish scissors yarn needle and stitch markers
